comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A search of Duluth News Tribune archive for "ice auto demon" from 1910-1918 finds a number of hits, but you need a subscription to see more than image snippets."  A snippet from January 29, 1913 shows the words "Demon III" in headline font and appears to have "motor ice" in the line below.

comment.author: 34844941@N03
comment._content: Looks pretty scary. Can't emagine trying to turn that thing.
